text: Carmelo Domenic Licciardello (January 19, 1956 â€“ February 16, 2021) known by his stage name, Carman, was an American contemporary Christian music singer- songwriter, television host, life coach and evangelist. Between 1987 and 1989, he was named Charisma magazine's readers' choice for favorite male vocalist. In 1990 and 1992, Billboard named him the Contemporary Christian Artist of the Year. Carman died on February 16, 2021 at a Las Vegas, Nevada hospital from problems caused by hernia surgery at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American gospel singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American television presenters Category:American gospel musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Actors from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Singers from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Writers from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Deaths from hernia
title: Carman (singer)
